actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to repeal section 1(b) of the Act of June 3, 1960, "to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct the San Luis unit of the Central Valley project, California, to enter into agreement with the State of California with respect to the construction and operation of such unit, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Repeals the prohibition against the use of water from the Federal San Luis unit, California, for the production of specified basic agricultural commodities in excess of normal supplies.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 1(b) of the Act of June 3, 1960, "to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct the San Luis unit of the Central Valley project, California, to enter into agreement with the State of California with respect to the construction and operation of such unit, and for other purposes.
